parameters.name: assetId
parameters.description: The ID of the asset. This can be either the actual ID in UUID format, or else externalId: followed by the external ID, if it has one. For more information, see Referencing objects with external IDs in the IoT SiteWise User Guide.

nested_items.name: assetId
nested_items.description: The ID of the asset, in UUID format.

nested_items.name: assetArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the asset, which has the following format.

nested_items.name: assetName
nested_items.description: The name of the asset.

nested_items.name: assetModelId
nested_items.description: The ID of the asset model that was used to create the asset.

nested_items.name: assetProperties
nested_items.description: The list of asset properties for the asset.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the asset property.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the property.

nested_items.name: alias
nested_items.description: The alias that identifies the property, such as an OPC-UA server data stream path (for example, /company/windfarm/3/turbine/7/temperature). For more information, see Mapping industrial data streams to asset properties in the IoT SiteWise User Guide.

nested_items.name: notification
nested_items.description: The asset property's notification topic and state. For more information, see UpdateAssetProperty.

nested_items.name: topic
nested_items.description: The MQTT topic to which IoT SiteWise publishes property value update notifications.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The current notification state.

nested_items.name: dataType
nested_items.description: The data type of the asset property.

nested_items.name: dataTypeSpec
nested_items.description: The data type of the structure for this property. This parameter exists on properties that have the STRUCT data type.

nested_items.name: unit
nested_items.description: The unit (such as Newtons or RPM) of the asset property.

nested_items.name: path
nested_items.description: The structured path to the property from the root of the asset.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the path segment.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the path segment.

nested_items.name: externalId
nested_items.description: The external ID of the asset property. For more information, see Using external IDs in the IoT SiteWise User Guide.

nested_items.name: assetHierarchies
nested_items.description: A list of asset hierarchies that each contain a hierarchyId. A hierarchy specifies allowed parent/child asset relationships.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the hierarchy. This ID is a hierarchyId.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The hierarchy name provided in the CreateAssetModel or UpdateAssetModel API operation.

nested_items.name: externalId
nested_items.description: The external ID of the hierarchy, if it has one. When you update an asset hierarchy, you may assign an external ID if it doesn't already have one. You can't change the external ID of an asset hierarchy that already has one. For more information, see Using external IDs in the IoT SiteWise User Guide.

nested_items.name: assetCompositeModels
nested_items.description: The composite models for the asset.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the composite model.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the composite model.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the composite model. For alarm composite models, this type is AWS/ALARM.

nested_items.name: properties
nested_items.description: The asset properties that this composite model defines.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the asset property.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the property.

nested_items.name: alias
nested_items.description: The alias that identifies the property, such as an OPC-UA server data stream path (for example, /company/windfarm/3/turbine/7/temperature). For more information, see Mapping industrial data streams to asset properties in the IoT SiteWise User Guide.

nested_items.name: notification
nested_items.description: The asset property's notification topic and state. For more information, see UpdateAssetProperty.

nested_items.name: topic
nested_items.description: The MQTT topic to which IoT SiteWise publishes property value update notifications.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The current notification state.

nested_items.name: dataType
nested_items.description: The data type of the asset property.

nested_items.name: dataTypeSpec
nested_items.description: The data type of the structure for this property. This parameter exists on properties that have the STRUCT data type.

nested_items.name: unit
nested_items.description: The unit (such as Newtons or RPM) of the asset property.

nested_items.name: path
nested_items.description: The structured path to the property from the root of the asset.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the path segment.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the path segment.

nested_items.name: externalId
nested_items.description: The external ID of the asset property. For more information, see Using external IDs in the IoT SiteWise User Guide.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the asset composite model.

nested_items.name: externalId
nested_items.description: The external ID of the asset composite model. For more information, see Using external IDs in the IoT SiteWise User Guide.

nested_items.name: assetCreationDate
nested_items.description: The date the asset was created, in Unix epoch time.

nested_items.name: assetLastUpdateDate
nested_items.description: The date the asset was last updated, in Unix epoch time.

nested_items.name: assetStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the asset, which contains a state and any error message.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The current status of the asset.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: The error code.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The error message.

nested_items.name: details
nested_items.description: A list of detailed errors.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: The error code.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The error message.

nested_items.name: assetDescription
nested_items.description: A description for the asset.

nested_items.name: assetCompositeModelSummaries
nested_items.description: The list of the immediate child custom composite model summaries for the asset.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the composite model that this summary describes.

nested_items.name: externalId
nested_items.description: An external ID to assign to the asset model.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the composite model that this summary describes.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of asset model.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description of the composite model that this summary describes.

nested_items.name: path
nested_items.description: The path that includes all the components of the asset model for the asset.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the path segment.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the path segment.

nested_items.name: assetExternalId
nested_items.description: The external ID of the asset, if any.
